heading: Safety Compliance Officer
text:
In addition to any other remedies or penalties authorized by law, the commissioner in his
or her discretion may require the presence of a SCO at any permitted site that has received immediately hazardous violations that
the commissioner determines adversely affect public safety and require the presence of a SCO to protect public safety. In any
circumstance where a SCO is required, the commissioner shall state in writing the circumstances necessitating the SCO, and the
duration of the compliance monitoring and/or conditions that must be satisfied prior to the termination of the compliance
monitoring.
